review: Went there for Dengue treatment. Doctor is very supportive and also takes followup via teleconsultation.

tags: None
review:
The doctor was incredible and so was the staff. First they took the details and did the normal check...

I had problem with soar throat and it was infected. So I could not swallow or drink or eat anything. She understood my problem so well and gave the appropriate medicine.

I was down with this since 31st December and went through wrong medication by some other doctor. 

Fortunately I found the doctor and was treated and healed in a days time. The nurse who gave me injection did incredible work. I never felt the pain at all. Not even after returning home. 

I will definitely recommend the doctor. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Stomach pain and stomach upset,Body Ache,Fever,Loose Motion,
review: Doctor is very kind. Her commitment to patient care and patients' well-being is truly commendable. Thank you for being an exceptional people friendly doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the doctor due to severe headache and I have been suffering from headaches for almost 2 months Doctor was patient enough,Listens carefully and probes well to understand the root cause and confirmed it was a migraine and the best part is that, she gives a lot of advice on lifestyle changes to overcome the issue instead of prescribing unnecessary medications. She did prescribe few medicines but very few and cost-effective ones. Best doctor and the other 2 staffs in the hospital were welcoming and too good, they did follow up the next day to check if I am doing good. Highly recommended.

tags: None
review: The doctor was very polite and patiently listened to all the problems that I explained. The staff was very cooperative. Overall excellent review. I would definitely recommend others to visit the clinic, and I would for sure visit it again in the future.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Absolutely satisfied with the experience. Dr.Ashwitha RN is the lady doctor available at Kammanahalli Clinikk branch. She patiently listens to all the issues and checks thoroughly the previous reports and diagnosis that the patient carries along during the visit there. All the allergies and previous medications are taken into account and advised with food restrictions if any. The doctor is very polite , explains the problem in detail, guides the patient about the medicines and precautions to be taken. The staff is very caring. Consultation fee and medicines prescribed are very reasonable.

tags: None
